head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE ¶ . ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ ¶ two months ¶ Two monthsaboveQ...

div.p: R80/7594, unit 1165, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed and dated by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the
two months
Two months
above
Quarter
struck through.
ending 31st August 1880.

cell.p:
Towards Flora Australiensis
See M to R. Ramsay, 12 April 1880 (in this edition as 80-04-12a) and notes thereto.

Total — Three hundred and forty pounds
——shillings and——pen
